about_the_game:
HeartWare is an interactive visual novel that invites players into a captivating story centered around Iris. The game explores her journey as she seeks meaningful connections and a sense of purpose. As the player, you will guide Iris through various scenarios, making choices that shape her experiences and determine the course of her story.

In HeartWare, every decision matters, leading to multiple unique endings that reflect your influence on Iris’s fate. Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted world and uncover the depth of Iris’s personality as you navigate her journey. With rich storytelling, HeartWare offers an unforgettable experience that will keep you hooked from start to finish.

Are you ready to explore the heart and mind of Iris?
